footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu anaapa kwa Qur'ani yenye kuweka wazi Dini ya Haki, yenye kuwabainishia watu yaliyo na maslaha ya dunia yao na Akhera yao, ili kujuulisha utukufu wa cheo chake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
